name: One finger to rule them all
name_original: One finger to rule them all
description:
One finger to rule them all is a puzzle game where you have a finger that is much like a Swiss army knife, It does everything but is not the best at anything.

You have to solve what ever the challenge is in front of you and proceed to the next room. And all of that revolves around you using the unique capabilities of your finger.

This was made in 7 days for VR JAM 2020

The team making this game consists of two people. My brother and myself.

Raimonds Petriks - uperphoenix@gmail.com

Eriks Petriks - overload1252@gmail.com

It was developed with SteamVR.

Input information:

  • Vive Wands are fully working
  • Valve Knuckles are fully working
  • Oculus Touch should work but I don't have a set to verify
  • WMR does not work, I don't have a set to debug it with unfortunately.
